entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
